txt.en: Raphûz wants to speak to you before you continue
'[placeholder], I am nearly finished.'
Instance: Proving His Bravery
'[placeholder], my friend, they overwhelm me!'
'I soon will fall! Is this my end, [placeholder]?'
'I have seen smaller scorpions in my days in Umbar, nothing as large as these. We should be cautious as we approach. Who is to know how dangerous this Kushlâgur may be?'
Raphûz wishes to speak to you before returning to Wrackwade
'This is becoming overwhelming, my friend.'

'I will admit I am nervous. The sting of these creatures is painful. If I had not brought some draughts with me to counteract their sting, I do not think I could continue.

'Fortune is upon me though, you are my companion.'

He smiles at you.

'Let us end this creature.'
'This is not an easy injury to push through, my friend.'
Kushlâgur is defeated
Raphûz asked you to accompany him to find and defeat Kushlâgur, the largest scoprion in Ambarûl.
Raphûz appears ready to enter the scorpion nest. Speak with him to begin your hunt for Kushlâgur.
'I am exhilarated, [placeholder]. The danger was clear, but we fought like warriors and put the beast down. I could not have done this without you.\n\n'Thank you, my friend.'
Assist and protect Raphûz
Assist and protect Raphûz as you search for Kushlâgur
Speak with Raphûz to continue the hunt for Kushlâgur
Raphûz looks nervous but resolved to defeat the scorpion Kushlâgur. You should speak with him before you continue.
You successfully defeated Kushlâgur. See how Raphûz is doing.
'The scorpion's sting burns, my friend.'
'I am fine, friend. I will tend my wounds.'
Defeat Kushlâgur
Speak with Raphûz to see how he is
Speak with Raphûz to begin the hunt for Kushlâgur
Raphûz is too injured to continue. You have failed.
Raphûz is too injured to continue. You have failed.
